actions.title: Executive Order on Securing the Southern Border
Proclamation Declaring a National Emergency at the Southern Border
Executive Order on Restoring Federal Death Penalty Enforcement
Executive Order on Ending Birthright Citizenship for Children of Undocumented Immigrants

pushback.title: ACLU v. Trump - Challenge to Birthright Citizenship Order

weeks.summary: President Trump signed a flurry of executive orders on his first day in office, focusing heavily on immigration enforcement and border security. The birthright citizenship order drew an immediate legal challenge from the ACLU.

actions.title: Executive Order on Withdrawing from the Paris Climate Agreement
Presidential Memorandum on Federal Hiring Freeze
Executive Order on Dismantling Federal DEI Programs

pushback.title: State of Washington v. Trump - Challenge to Border Emergency Declaration
Judge Alsup Issues TRO on Birthright Citizenship Order

weeks.summary: The administration continued its rapid-fire executive action pace, targeting climate policy and federal workforce diversity. A federal judge in Seattle issued a temporary restraining order blocking the birthright citizenship executive order.

actions.title: Agency Rule Suspending Refugee Admissions for 120 Days
Executive Order on Expanding Energy Production on Federal Lands

pushback.title: National Immigration Law Center v. DHS - Refugee Admissions Suspension Challenge
Coalition of 18 State Attorneys General Challenge to DEI Dismantling Order
Nationwide Protests Against Immigration Executive Orders

weeks.summary: The administration expanded its immigration restrictions with a refugee admissions pause while opening federal lands for energy development. Legal challenges mounted as state attorneys general organized a coalition response to the DEI order.

actions.title: Policy Directive on Restructuring the Department of Education
Executive Order on Imposing Tariffs on Chinese Imports

pushback.title: Federal District Court Injunction on Refugee Admissions Pause
Senate Democrats Introduce Resolution to Overturn Border Emergency

weeks.summary: The administration signaled plans to restructure the Department of Education and imposed new tariffs on Chinese goods. Courts continued pushing back, with a federal judge granting an injunction against the refugee admissions suspension.

actions.title: Presidential Memorandum on Reducing Federal Workforce by Attrition

pushback.title: AFGE Union Challenge to Federal Hiring Freeze
California Legislature Passes State-Level Climate Protection Act

weeks.summary: The administration focused on government restructuring with a workforce reduction memo. Federal employee unions filed suit against the hiring freeze while California moved to enact state-level climate protections in response to the Paris Agreement withdrawal.

actions.title: Executive Order on Restricting Transgender Military Service
Agency Rule Revising EPA Emissions Standards

pushback.title: Lambda Legal v. Department of Defense - Transgender Service Ban Challenge
Fourth Circuit Upholds Injunction on Birthright Citizenship Order

weeks.summary: The administration extended its social policy agenda with a transgender military service restriction and rolled back EPA emissions standards. The Fourth Circuit upheld the injunction against the birthright citizenship order, dealing a significant legal blow.

actions.title: Signing Statement on Appropriations Bill Limiting DOGE Authority

pushback.title: House Bipartisan Resolution Opposing Tariff Authority Expansion
National Education Association v. Department of Education - Restructuring Challenge
Nine States File Amicus Brief Supporting Border Emergency Challenge

weeks.summary: New executive actions slowed as the administration issued a signing statement asserting broad authority over the government efficiency initiative. Congressional pushback intensified with a bipartisan resolution challenging expanded tariff authority.

actions.title: Executive Order on Reclassifying Federal Employees Under Schedule F

pushback.title: AFGE v. OPM - Schedule F Reclassification Challenge
Federal Judge Blocks Enforcement of Transgender Military Service Restriction
EPA Career Staff Resistance to Emissions Standards Rollback

weeks.summary: The Schedule F executive order to reclassify federal workers as at-will employees drew immediate union lawsuits. Courts blocked the transgender military service ban while reports emerged of internal EPA resistance to emissions rollbacks.

actions.title: Presidential Memorandum on Restricting Press Access to White House Briefings

pushback.title: White House Correspondents' Association v. Executive Office - Press Access Challenge
District Court Denies Government Motion to Dismiss Refugee Admissions Case

weeks.summary: The administration moved to restrict press briefing access, prompting a First Amendment lawsuit from the White House Correspondents' Association. Courts continued to sustain challenges against the refugee admissions freeze.

actions.title: Policy Directive on Withdrawing from World Health Organization

pushback.title: Senate Foreign Relations Committee Holds Hearing on WHO Withdrawal
DOJ Appeals Refugee Admissions Injunction to Ninth Circuit
New York and Massachusetts Pass State-Level DEI Protection Laws

weeks.summary: The WHO withdrawal directive drew bipartisan Senate scrutiny. States increasingly moved to counter federal policy at the state level, with New York and Massachusetts enacting DEI protections in direct response to the federal rollback.

actions.title: Executive Order on Expanding Work Requirements for Federal Assistance Programs

pushback.title: National Health Law Program v. HHS - Medicaid Work Requirements Challenge
Ninth Circuit Hears Oral Arguments on Schedule F Injunction
Bipartisan Senate Bill to Codify Birthright Citizenship Introduced

weeks.summary: The administration pushed expanded work requirements for Medicaid and other federal assistance. Congressional pushback grew with a bipartisan Senate effort to codify birthright citizenship while appeals courts considered multiple administration policies.

actions.title: Agency Rule Implementing New Immigration Detention Standards

pushback.title: SPLC v. ICE - Immigration Detention Standards Challenge
Federal Court Rules Schedule F Order Exceeds Executive Authority

weeks.summary: New immigration detention standards faced legal challenge from civil rights organizations. A federal court ruled the Schedule F reclassification exceeded executive authority, marking a major setback for the government reform agenda.

pushback.title: Supreme Court Declines Emergency Stay on Birthright Citizenship Injunction
DOJ Appeals Schedule F Ruling to D.C. Circuit

weeks.summary: No new executive actions were issued as the administration focused on defending existing orders in court. The Supreme Court declined to intervene on the birthright citizenship injunction, leaving the lower court block in place for the foreseeable future.
